Alt-Balaji

AltBalaji tied up with Eko in July 2019 to help expand their penetration, especially in the LMI segment. These customers who have viewing habits in line with their digitally abled peers in tier 1 and tier 2 cities were able to leverage Ekoâ€™s 150,000 strong merchant network to be assisted with their app downloads as well as pay for their subscription in cash.
